description.original: Assign colors to tags. Has integrations with other plugins, like Kanban.
description.translation: Assign colors to tags. Has integrations with other plugins, like Kanban.

dict.name: \"Creates a code block at caret of: name: "在颜色组的插入处创建一个代码块，您可以手动将其复制到graph.json文件中。"
dict.name: \"EXPERIMENTAL : export tags to gr: name: "实验：将标签导出到graph.json。这会覆盖您当前的graph.json。使用风险自负！"
dict.name: \"EXPERIMENTAL : export TAGS LINKE: name: "实验：将链接到文件夹注释的标签导出到graph.json。这会覆盖您当前的graph.json。使用风险自负！"
text: `Don't add the '#' before the tag.`
dict.text: `If you forget this, this is done: text: `如果你忘记了这一点，这是在代码中为你完成的，导致输入被更改。`
dict.text: \"Doesn't integrate with a particu: text: "不与特定插件集成，但依赖于“文件夹注释”的概念。"
dict..setName(\"Apply Tag color to note backg: .setName("将标签颜色应用于笔记背景")
dict..setName(\"Apply Tag color to note's pro: .setName("将标签颜色应用于笔记的属性“标签”字段")
dict..setName(\"Apply Opacity to Folder Note': .setName("将不透明度应用于文件夹注释的背景颜色")
dict..setName(\"Apply tag color to kanban lis: .setName("将标签颜色应用于看板列表")
dict..setName(\"Apply Opacity to KanBan compo: .setName("将不透明度应用于KanBan组件的背景颜色")
dict..setName(\"Apply Opacity to tag backgrou: .setName("将不透明度应用于标签背景颜色")
dict..setName(\"Apply Opacity to Canvas compo: .setName("将不透明度应用于Canvas组件的背景颜色")
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\t\tYou can specify wh:
.setDesc(`
					You can specify which value to use for the CSS property '空白'. 
					Intended uses are 'pre' or 'nowrap'.
				`)
dict..setDesc(\"Colors the tags in the body o: .setDesc("为笔记正文中的标签着色。禁用大多数用法的主设置。")
dict..setDesc(\"Uses a tag in the note's prop: .setDesc("在注释的属性中使用标记，并将其颜色应用于工作区背景")
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tAllows you to view a:
.setDesc(`
				Allows you to view and use some extra debug option. 
				Don'如果你不使用这些't know what you are doing.
			`)
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tReloads the styling:
.setDesc(`
				Reloads the styling elements of this plugin. 
				Warning: Might change order of tags in CSS and therefor chances to alter the look of certain things, 
					like the kanban boards. 
			`)
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tAllows you utilize e:
.setDesc(`
				Allows you utilize experimental commands. Most of these are only available in the Desktop App.
				These commands are clearly defined by "实验性" and should be used with extreme caution.
				Restart Obsidian after enabling and use at your own risk!
			`)
dict..setDesc(\"Auto detects changes in a fil: .setDesc("自动检测文件属性标记的更改并更新文件查看器。")
dict..setDesc(`Traverses your vault and store: .setDesc(`遍历vault，并将笔记中找到的所有标记与它们所在的文件夹同名存储。`)
dict..setDesc(\"Allows you define if an item': .setDesc("允许您定义项目的背景是否应具有不透明度偏移")
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tApplies the tag colo:
.setDesc(`
				Applies the tag color, of the tag within the card, to the background color of the card. 
				Known issue: When a card has multiple tags, the color of the card is randomly chosen.
			`)
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tHides the '#' from t:
.setDesc(`
				Hides the '#' from the kanban view, 
					though they still have to be typed out within the used areas.
			`)
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tApplies the tag colo:
.setDesc(`
				Applies the tag color, of the tag within the list's title, to the background color of the list. 
				Known issue: When a list has multiple tags, the color of the list is randomly chosen.
			`)
dict..setDesc(`Enables an opacity offset for: .setDesc(`为标签的背景颜色启用不透明度偏移`)
dict..setDesc(\"Allows the usage of `;` or `\: .setDesc("允许使用`；`或者`\\n`（新行）将多个标签绑定到一种颜色。")
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\t\tAdds a small button:
.setDesc(`
				Adds a small button next to each color picker, allowing users to auto generate an appropriate background color.
				This chosen color isn't always 100%, so please adjust when needed
			`)
dict..setDesc(`\n\t\t\tApplies the tag color,:
.setDesc(`
			Applies the tag color, of the tag within the canvas's card, to the background color of the canvas card.
			The Value slider and setter to the right, are the luminance offsets for the background.
			`)
